data.title: Costigan, Matthew D.
data.meta_description: Matt focuses on mergers and acquisitions, private equity and venture capital, securities issuances, and corporate governance, including divestitures, equity investments, public securities offerings, and venture capital financings.
data.text: Matt was listed in the 2023 and 2024 editions of The Best Lawyers in AmericaÂ®in the area of FinTech practice. He is recognized by The Legal 500 U.S. for his work in M&A, joint ventures, and private equity and venture capital funds. He was also recognized in Chambers USA 2015 as one of the nation's top lawyers in Corporate/M&A: Private Equity.
